resources.string: This activity shows the list of artists, taken from my discogs.com discography.\n
In this activity the user can chose an album from the selected artist. This list comes from the discogs.com API. As an example the only active album is BUT SERIOUSLY !
In this activity the album selected is displayed, all its songs are listed and can be played thanks to the media player.\n The album detail is retrieved from the discog.com api
